name: BUggGGeD
description:
AS aN ARtIfiCiaL InTeLLiGENcE EnTITy, YoU neEd tO fix tHe BuUUUUUU%$!@#$_~%)*@#( .......

It is a bullet-hell top-down shooting game for Windows.

Player is an AI entity in a digital world to fix BUGS but is possible to be infected by the bugs and BUGS. Eliminate them to show out the intelligence of human beings!

Avoid the black bullets otherwise you wILl BE iNFecttttEDDD...

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Use Item: Q/E

If you are stuck and can't get through the stages, try typing "BUG" in the game!
